newsitem.title: SPAIN: One dead, 14 hurt as train hits truck in Spain.
newsitem.headline: One dead, 14 hurt as train hits truck in Spain.

text.p: One man died and 14 people were injured when a train smashed into a cement truck in northern Spain late on Wednesday, a spokesman for state railway Renfe said.
The train, travelling from Irun near the French border to Lisbon, had just left the city of Burgos and was crossing a road when the incident happened.
The dead man was the train driver's assistant.
Four people were detained in hospital. The rest, including including the truck driver, were treated and released.
